## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15460](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15460)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>atBRX1-1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis homologue of yeast Brx1 1
- **Description:**   Ribosomal RNA processing Brix domain protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090131
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [brx1-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Growth delay.  Impaired development of rosette leaves and delay in flowering.
